title: Aid the Underduke
content: gives away her plan. Travel to the Counting House Bank, and ask Head Clerk Meadhoney to permit you to enter the vault. (You can use Persuasion, Intimidation, Deception skills or by having Jaheira with you.) You can find the bank pass and the code by sneaking upstairs, the pass can be found on a side table in the corner of the first room (X-103, Y-185), the code (1356) to the High-security vault is hidden in a book in the second room.
